arts.ttl: Newcastle plot STUNNING €90m transfer raid on Barcelona
arts.sum: While Newcastle's squad is very well built to play fast and direct football with bundles athleticism and aggression across many positions but particularly in midfield where Eddie Howe has three snarling pitbulls ready to rock, it is short a genuine creative wizard. Having endured a frustrating summer 2025 when they lost out on several top targets, Newcastle want 2026 to be much more fruitful and to that end are looking to raid Barcelona for one of their elite talents.

arts.ttl: Guimaraes asserts that Newcastle ‘play against Barcelona, not Lamine’ on Thursday night
arts.sum: The Newcastle United midfielder made clear we "play against Barcelona, not Lamine" on Thursday. Barcelona have a wonderful team and we have to be ready to fight right in that central midfield area.”

arts.ttl: When Newcastle beat Barcelona in the Champions League
arts.sum: Faustino Asprilla scores a hat-trick against Barcelona on Newcastle United's Champions League debut in 1997.

arts.ttl: Champions League — Newcastle vs. Barcelona – Eddie Howe: Pre-Match Press Conference
arts.sum: Newcastle United begin their Champions League campaign at home to Barcelona on Thursday in a clash that brings back memories of the two clubs’ 1997 meeting, nearly 30 years ago. Patrick Kluivert and Thiago Motta scored in a 2-0 win for the Catalan side the last time both clubs met in 2003, and the visitors […]
